elements.name: vaadin-list-box
elements.description:
`<vaadin-list-box>` is a Web Component for creating menus.

```
  <vaadin-list-box selected="2">
    <vaadin-item>Item 1</vaadin-item>
    <vaadin-item>Item 2</vaadin-item>
    <vaadin-item>Item 3</vaadin-item>
    <vaadin-item>Item 4</vaadin-item>
  </vaadin-list-box>
```

### Styling

The following shadow DOM parts are available for styling:

Part name         | Description
------------------|------------------------
`items`           | The items container

See [Styling Components](https://vaadin.com/docs/latest/styling/styling-components) documentation.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description:
If true, the user cannot interact with this element.
When the element is disabled, the selected item is
not updated when `selected` property is changed.

attributes.name: selected
attributes.description:
The index of the item selected in the items array.
Note: Not updated when used in `multiple` selection mode.

attributes.name: multiple
attributes.description: Specifies that multiple options can be selected at once.

attributes.name: theme
attributes.description: The theme variants to apply to the component.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description:
If true, the user cannot interact with this element.
When the element is disabled, the selected item is
not updated when `selected` property is changed.

properties.name: selected
properties.description:
The index of the item selected in the items array.
Note: Not updated when used in `multiple` selection mode.

properties.name: multiple
properties.description: Specifies that multiple options can be selected at once.

properties.name: selectedValues
properties.description:
Array of indexes of the items selected in the items array
Note: Not updated when used in single selection mode.

events.name: selected-changed
events.description:
Fired when the selection is changed.
Not fired when used in `multiple` selection mode.

events.name: selected-values-changed
events.description:
Fired when the selection is changed.
Not fired in single selection mode.
